trans-unit.source: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA encryption or decryption operations.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o modo de preenchimento e parâmetros a utilizar com as operações de encriptação ou desencriptação de RSA.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance whose <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*> is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref> with the given hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> instância cujos <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>é <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"> </xref> com o algoritmo de hash fornecido.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: An object whose mode is is with the hash algorithm specified by hashAlgorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto cujo modo é é com o algoritmo hash especificado pelo hashAlgorithm .

trans-unit.source: The property of hashAlgorithm is either or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O propriedade hashAlgorithm está ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância atual é igual para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: `obj` is equal to the current instance if it is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object and the two objects have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: `obj`é igual para a instância atual, se for um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>objeto e os dois objetos têm idênticos <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comparar.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é igual para a instância atual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância atual é igual ao especificado <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: `instance` and the current instance are equal if they have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: `instance`e a instância atual são iguais, se tiverem idênticos <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comparar.

trans-unit.source: if other is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se other é igual para a instância atual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash desta <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The hash code of this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash desta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the padding mode represented by this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo de preenchimento representado por este <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash algorithm used in conjunction with the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref> padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo hash utilizado em conjunto com o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"> </xref> modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*> property is not <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>propriedade não é <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"> </xref>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa a encriptação de preenchimento encriptação assimétrico ideal (OAEP) padrão com um algoritmo de hash SHA1.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o padrão de encriptação OAEP com um algoritmo de hash SHA1.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa a encriptação de preenchimento encriptação assimétrico ideal (OAEP) padrão com um algoritmo de hash SHA256.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o padrão de encriptação OAEP com um algoritmo de hash SHA256.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA-384 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa a encriptação de preenchimento encriptação assimétrico ideal (OAEP) padrão com um algoritmo de hash SHA-384.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA384 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o padrão de encriptação OAEP com um algoritmo de hash SHA384.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa a encriptação de preenchimento encriptação assimétrico ideal (OAEP) padrão com um algoritmo de hash SHA512.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o padrão de encriptação OAEP com um algoritmo de hash SHA512.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se duas especificadas <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> objetos são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are equal.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>objetos são iguais se os seus <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>valores de propriedade são iguais.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto primeiro a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de segundo a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se duas especificadas <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> objetos são unequal.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are not equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>Objetos não são iguais se os seus <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>valores de propriedade não são iguais.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto primeiro a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de segundo a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objecto que representa a encriptação de PKCS #1 padrão.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o padrão de encriptação de PKCS #1.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a representação de cadeia de atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object is the concatenation of its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and `OaepHashAlgorithm.Name` properties.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>objeto é a concatenação do seu <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>e `OaepHashAlgorithm.Name` propriedades.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current object.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia do objeto atual.
